name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior JavaScript Engineer with 8 years of experience, I leverage my extensive expertise in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and cloud technologies such as **AWS Lambda** to develop high-performance B2B SaaS applications. My proficiency in API design and documentation, along with hands-on experience in **REST** and **SOAP** services, allows me to create seamless integrations that enhance user experience and drive business growth. I have a solid background in database management using **SQL**, **SQLite**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring robust data handling and storage solutions.

I excel in building secure, scalable applications, employing automated testing practices and utilizing the **Serverless Framework** to streamline deployment processes. As a natural team leader, I emphasize strong communication and collaboration, cultivating problem-solving skills to navigate complex challenges. Furthermore, my experience developing in a microservices architecture and implementing CI/CD practices contributes to the deployment of efficient and compliant systems.
